sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import Card from './shared/Card' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { FaTimes, FaEdit } from 'react-icons/fa' import {useContext} from 'react' import FeedbackContext from '../context/FeedbackContext' function FeedbackItem({item}) { const {deleteFeedback} = useContext(FeedbackContext) const {feedbackEdit} = useContext(FeedbackContext) return (
{item.rating}
{item.text}
 ) } FeedbackItem.propTypes = { item: PropTypes.object.isRequired } export default FeedbackItem
